ROOT.GetMatch: select place,sportname,day(starttime) as day1,eventname,against,starttime,endtime from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_game_calender where 1=1 order by starttime
ROOT.GetMatchTime: select distinct place,sportname,day(starttime) as day1,eventname,against,starttime,endtime , starttime - interval(2) hour to hour as starttime1,endtime + interval(1) hour to hour as endtime2 from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_game_calender where day(starttime - interval(2) hour to hour)={0} or day(endtime)={0} order by place,starttime
ROOT.GetCaMatch: select place,sportname,day(starttime) as day1,eventname,against,starttime,endtime from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_game_calender_ca where 1=1 order by starttime
ROOT.GetCaMatchTime: select distinct place,sportname,day(starttime) as day1,eventname,against,starttime,endtime , starttime - interval(2) hour to hour as starttime1,endtime + interval(1) hour to hour as endtime2 from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_game_calender_ca where day(starttime - interval(2) hour to hour)={0} or day(endtime)={0} order by place,starttime
ROOT.GetEmergencyLeader: select diqu,xingming,shouji_haoma,beizhu from ( select xingming,shouji_haoma,diqu,beizhu,case when beizhu='队长' then 0 else 1 end as num from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_owg_yj_renyuan where beizhu in ('队长','副队长') and xingming != '' ) order by num

yjbz.Getrenyuan: SELECT XUHAO, DANWEI,XINGMING,NIANLING_XINGBIE,BUMEN_ZHIWU,GUDING_DIANHUA, SHOUJI_HAOMA,BEIZHU,FENZU FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_owg_yj_renyuan where xingming !='' and DIQU = {0}
yjbz.Getjichu: SELECT XUHAO, DALEI, ZHONGLEI, XIAOLEI, DANWEI,PEIZHI_SHULIANG FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_owg_yj_jichushebei where DIQU = {0}
yjbz.Gettezhong: SELECT XUHAO, DALEI, ZHONGLEI, XIAOLEI, DANWEI,PEIZHI_SHULIANG FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_owg_yj_tezhongshebei where DIQU = {0}

ROOT.Getowgtq: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT WEATHER_SOURCE_ID,WEATHER_CONDITION_RESULT,TEMPERATURE,CREATETIME,WIND_DIR_RESULT,WIND_LEVEL_RESULT from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_WEATHER_REAL_INFO WHERE WEATHER_SOURCE_ID in ('900499010000000134', '900499010000000132', '900499010000000009', '900499010000000149', '900499010000000149', '900499010000000129') AND CREATETIME>={0} ) A ORDER BY CREATETIME desc
